message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $180. This product is really high-quality and I believe you'll get great value from it.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
